properties.name: doNotAddGlobalFragmentByDefault
properties.description: Allows to define whether the c8y_Global fragment should be added per default on newly created datapoints.
properties.rawdescription: Allows to define whether the c8y_Global fragment should be added per default on newly created datapoints.

properties.name: showCheckboxForGlobalFragment
properties.description: Will make a checkbox visible that allows the user to take the decision if the c8y_Global fragment should be set or not.
properties.rawdescription: Will make a checkbox visible that allows the user to take the decision if the c8y_Global fragment should be set or not.
